label: topic
Notes: DCT says advised to take from a list.

label: standalone
Notes: No' means the description can only be used if it is the object of a triple; yes & either seem to be equivalent

label: class
Notes: The valid RDF  class(es) for this description; only for RDF data

label: value link
Notes: Assuming a statement can be reused within a set

label: datatype value constraint
Notes: this needs to be a shex statement, e.g. <= today's date, or a regex?

label: language tag constraint
Notes: one or more language tags that are considered valid

label: unique language constraint
value?: ShEx issue #47 - may be available in the future
Notes: only one occurrence of each language tag is allowed
